summary: A needy couple in a bad marriage travel back to Stockholm after a trip to Italy. Meanwhile, a widow resists seductions from two different persons - her psychiatrist and a lesbian friend.
cast: Eva Henning|Birger Malmsten|Birgit Tengroth|Hasse Ekman|Mimi Nelson|Bengt Eklund|Gaby Stenberg|Naima Wifstrand|Carl Andersson|Wiktor Andersson|Verner Arpe|Ingmar Bergman|Britta Brunius|Calle Flygare|Sven-Eric Gamble|Inga Gill|Herman Greid|Helge Hagerman|Else-Merete Heiberg|Estrid Hesse|Laila Jokimo|Gunnar Nielsen|Oscar Rosander|Sif Ruud|Monica Weinzierl|Öllegård Wellton|Peter Winner|Inga-Lill Åhström
title: Tres amores extraños
